DOC.brief_title: Comparing Liquid Versus Solid Forms Sugars Whey Protein
DOC.detailed_description: Three randomize cross-over design experiment use compare effect solid liquid form gelatin ( 6 g ) experiment 1 , sucrose ( 75 g ) mixture 50 % glucose/ 50 % fructose ( G50 : F50 ) experiment 2 , acid sweet whey protein ( 50 g ) experiment 3 healthy normal weight male . The control water ( experiment 1 3 ) calorie-free sweetened water gelatin ( sweet gelatin , experiment 1 ) without gelatin ( sweet control , experiment 2 ) . Subjective average appetite measure visual analogue scale frequently 1 h ad libitum food intake measure 1 h treatment consumption .
